kesako.utilities

Class DBUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.utilities.DBUtilities

  • public class DBUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Data-base utilities.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.sql.Connection cn 
      private static org.apache.log4j.Logger logger
      Log4J logger of the class.
      private static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> sourcePath
      Vector object that stores the paths of sources.
      private static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> validPath
      Vector object that stores the paths of directories of all indexed files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBUtilities()
      The constructor create a connection object to the data-base, the statement object, and initialize the validPath vector.

      • getFileId

        public static int getFileId(java.sql.Connection cn,
            java.lang.String uri)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return the id of the file in the data-base
        Parameters:
        uri - path of the file for which the id is researched.
        Returns:
        if the file is in the data-base the id is returned, else -1
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createSource

        public static void createSource(java.sql.Connection cn,
                java.lang.String sourceName,
                java.lang.String sourcePath)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create a source in the data-base only if the path doesn't exist in the data-base.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - Name of the source
        sourcePath - path of the source
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateSource

        public static void updateSource(java.sql.Connection cn,
                int idSource,
                java.lang.String sourceName,
                int flag)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update the name and the flag of the source which the id is idSource.
        Be careful. The existence of the source is not verified before updating.
        The flag's value is not verified before updating.
        Parameters:
        idSource - id of the source to update
        sourceName - name of the source to update.
        flag - flag of the source to update. Values of the flag are: Constant.TO_INDEX and Constant.TO_SUPPRESSED
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • populateValidPath

        private static void populateValidPath()
        The method populate the vector validPath with the paths of all directory's paths from root to all source's paths.
        Today, the method works only with Unix and Linux systems.

      • isAccetableFile

        public static boolean isAccetableFile(java.io.File dir)
        Return TRUE if the directory or the file is in the path of a source.
        Today, the method works only with Unix and Linux operating systems. If the OS is not Unix or Linux, the method always return TRUE.
        This method is useful for a JFileChooser object to show only paths needed to access to indexed files.
        Parameters:
        dir - directory for with the validity of the path is tested.
